result.execSummary:
One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kristin N Sammons is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Order for reimbursement of GAL or Attorney

records.addlTxt: Affidavit for Services Rendered filed by Atty Sonderhouse.
Hearing on August 30, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Hearing on August 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Kristin N Sammons in court with attorney Ronald James Sonderhouse.   Lawn Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Sonderhouse advises the Court that the Defendant has requested Attorney Pat Brennan represent her on the cases.  The Defendant confirms Attorney Sonderhouse statement to the Court.  Attorney Pat Brennan appears in Court and advises the Court that he will represent the Defendant if the Court adjourns the trial and allows additional time for him to review the cases.  The State does not object.  The Court grants the motion and Attorney Pat Brennan is now counsel of record.  The Court adjourns the trial and reschedules the trial.   Attorney Brennan to prepare a substitution and order of counsel and file with the Court.  Hearing scheduled for August 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Hearing scheduled for August 30, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Motion to Withdraw as Counsel filed by Atty Sonderhouse.

Defendant to pay: $100 per month commencing 12/18/15.

The Court grants the adjournment and reschedules the trial and this case to tag along   Hearing scheduled for June 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Hearing scheduled for June 14, 2016 at 08:15 am.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Defendant Kristin N Sammons in court with attorney Gary R Schmaus.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Schmaus indicates the defendant is not eligible for the public defender, therefore will be withdrawing as counsel.  Court allows Attorney Schmaus to withdraw as counsel.  Defendant is requesting the court appoint counsel.  Court grants the request.  Defendant to reimburse the county at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 12/18/15, and by the 18th of each month thereafter.  Court tolled time limits for preliminary hearing.  Hearing scheduled for December 28, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing at 12-18-2015 08:15 am
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no contact with Marya W,  Rick P or his children or their residences.

Bail set at $5000.00
